Halucigen replies. "Thank you"

He flies down and through the deactivated shield segment.  As he 
comes through and and nears the ground he transforms to his 
robot mode.  His wings fold over to his back while a stinger 
protrudes from his lower back arcing over his head, staggering 
slightly.  He lands and awaits FZ.
